nodes.text: A Cerean male was the father to Jedi Master Ki-Adi-Mundi. A farmer, he and his family owned their farm, where they lived in seclusion with limited technology, as was typical of the Cerean culture. In 88 BBY, he wilingly gave up his son to Jedi Master An'ya Kuro when the latter detected Mundi to be strong in the Force.
He died in the Battle of Cerea in 21 BBY.
